channel.title: PI - General store
channel.description:
I'm using TrisidiaX Source, and everytime I sell an item to shop I get dced, it sells it.. but I get dced.
This is the error
[9/14/12 7:32 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 101 [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.shops.ShopAssistant.addShopItem(ShopAssi stant.java:686) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.shops.ShopAssistant.sellItem(ShopAssista nt.java:663) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.BankAll.processPacket(Ba nkAll.java:33) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:139) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:2117) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:149) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:191) [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: Game saved for player solo [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: [DEREGISTERED]: solo [9/14/12 7:32 PM]: [REGISTERED]: solo

item.title: PI - General store
item.dc:creator: @inzeladun inzeladun
item.description:
@inzeladun wrote:

Thank you sir I’ll try fixing that now.

I fixed it, it wasn’t that.

Read full topic

item.title: PI - General store
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

You tried to add to many shops, the array is to small to handle the number that you put on that shop(100 or 99 is the max I believe by default.)

Read full topic

item.title: PI - General store
item.dc:creator: @inzeladun inzeladun
item.description:
@inzeladun wrote:

I’m sticking to this one, I’ve fixed a lot of bugs with it already, and one little shop problem won’t stop me from trying.
If you can’t solve it, i’ll wait for someone who can help me. Thanks for your input though.

Read full topic

item.title: PI - General store
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

best information anyone can give you here is to simply delete that source and download another one because if that’s the only thing you have come across your in for alot more, trisidiaX may have alot of content, but the amount of bugs/glitches/warnings etc is not even worth the time your going to have to spend on it, same with insidiaX.

Read full topic
